posts.post_content: Looking to buy lots of any raw t206's with no back damage in at least good condition up to near mint.  Looking for 10 to 1,000 card lots.   I will pay a fair price if they are nice.  Please e-mail at [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]
Thanks to Tony Andrea and James Bishop for some nice cards.  Anybody else want to sell some of they're t206's.  [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]

I have a few in good to better condition.
Not looking to sell, but I would trade for a few that you're offering for sale in another thread.

Email me at [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] if you're interested.

Thanks.

Doug
Got some good collections already.  All I need to see is a few scans or pics.

I'm selling some raw t206 cards on eBay this week, including SLs and HOFs:

[url]http://www.ebay.com/sch/agent001/m.html?_nkw&_armrs=1&_from&_ipg&_trksid=p3686[/url]

I have the following (16) ungraded cards including (5) Southern League cards:
(Total $769) Make me an offer.
I'll send scans if interested.

1 Fred Abbott (Port.) 24

2 George Bell (over head) 26

3 Dode Criss 22

4 Paul Davidson 24

5 Jerry Downs 18

6 Roy Ellam 78

7 Elmer Flick 67

8 Willie Keeler (Port./poor cond.) 46

9 James LaFitte (S.L.) 47

10 Jimmy Lavender 12

11 Perry Lipe (S.L.) 59

12 Christy Matthewson (Black cap/poor cond.) 118

13 Molly Miller (S.L.) 79

14 Chief Myers (fielding) 27

15 Sid Smith (S.L.) 74

16 Tony Thebo (S.L.) 48
I know someone has t206's they don't want hidden away collecting dust.   Take some pics and send them to [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url].  I'll buy em.  The more the better.
